Window.title: Tab
Window.View:
>
Like on Android, Tabs on iOS now have 'selected' and 'unselected' events. See the Console for the payload.
Also note that the introduction of these events on the TabGroup in 5.1 has been reverted. Just use 'focus' and 'blur' as you did before.
On iOS you can now change the position of the tab icon. See the TSS to see how we moved the icon down a bit.
